name: SCHOOL SIMULATOR MULTIPLAYER
description:
Make you feel good in the school! Try what would it be like if you could do anything in the school break. Crush! Don’t kid yourself. Break out from the roll of eager beaver! You don’t have to worry about thing, just do it!The school is full of movable objects, just grab them and throw them to your schoolmates, but don’t delay, because they are ready!If they hit you, it will be difficult to stand up, so be careful! The targeting line will help you to throw accurate.

The current features include:
  • moveable objects (e.g.chairs, school desks, dogs, cats, horses, and many many more)
  • breast physics
  • ragdoll physics
  • 5 optional characters
  • singe player mode
  • multiplayer mode
  • available in Win and Mac OSX
  • cross-platform multiplayer
